page.title: 06Manor Farm, Leigh Delamere
page.content: On{Mr King's farm}there are cows, chickens and some ponds. Mr King has got about 3 workers on his farm. He has different types of tractors like International, Ford and Mini Fork Lift. The farm is in{Leigh Delamere. Mr King grows different types of crops like wheat, barley and grass. He gets the cows in at 5:00 a.m. and in the day time at 2:30 p.m. He has 6 milking cows and he has old and new machinery. The new{machinery}is a roller, plough, dung spreader, yard scraper, tractors, trailers, girdle, cage wheel, water ballast, front end weight, a drill, side spreader, fertilizer and seed sower, combine harvester and square bailer, and the old machinery is a plough and spikey roller.
